General.Name: Au Gold Corp
General.Description: Au Gold Corp. focuses on the exploration of gold and mineral prospects in Canada. The company's principal property is the Ponderosa gold property, which consists of four contiguous mineral claims covering an area of 420 hectares located in the Spences Bridge Gold Belt of British Columbia. Au Gold Corp. was founded in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 595 Howe Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2T5
